TopicTitle: Which mods to use along with Real Solar System?

Articles.Content:
I have a clean install of version 0.90 of KSP and I am wanting to try out RSS. Which mods will I need to get have the best experience with RSS?

Hear is a list of mods that I am wanting to use....

* Real Solar System (v8.6.1)

* Realism Overhaul (v8.4.1)

* Tweak Scale (v1.50)

* Remote Tech (v1.6.3)

* Ferram Aerospace (v0.14.7)

* Deadly Reentry (v6.4.0)

Are there any other mods that I would need to get RSS to work? If so which ones?

RO has a list of required mods, so your list will be rather longer than that (RealFuels, AJE, etc). Also Procedural Parts and Procedural fairings and Engine Ignitor are highly recommended.

If you want to play career at all, get http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/103196-0-90-Realistic-Progression-Zero-(RP-0)-Lightweight-RealismOverhaul-career-v0-23-8-Feb

Finally, get 1.7.2 of Ven's Stock Revamp and things will look much better. RO recommends Ven's Stock Revamp.
